extendedInfo.description: live wallpaper of an evening sunset reflecting off a rippling lake.Settings available for speed and sizesSave to sd cardShare with family and friends through facebook, twitter, etc.By Downloading this app you will be agreeing to Opt-in to the ad networks below that will serve notification ads and an Icon ad. "This app contains ads that may appear in the notification tray or homescreen as an Icon. You can optout the ads from the links below: Airpush Optout: http://www.airpush.com/optout Leadbolt Optout: http://opt.leadbolt.com/ SendDroid Optout: http://senddroid.com/opt-out/ To delete the icons just hold your finger on them and drag to the trash can to delete."

reviews.title: So terrible...
reviews.comment: It\'s grainy, it glitches, it\'s blurry, it\'s just plain awful. I wish i could get the 30 seconds of my life back that it took to set up.
reviews.author: Joe Leavalone
